Hey Homero • Live more, clean less.

The client

Homero is an NYC based company offering cleaning services in Manhattan and Brooklyn.

The Problem

Homero needs a landing page where users can learn more about the services offered and get a price estimation for house cleaning. Users who already have an account should be able to log in and keep track of their bookings. New users can select the services they need and get a total estimation for cleaning and book their service right away.

The Solution

After receiving the client's designs, I created the landing page using React, TypeScript, and Styled Components. You can see the final product below.

Pick your service and get a quote straight away

Learn more about what services are offered in each cleaning type

Timeline

5 weeks.

Tools & Technologies used

Figma, React, TypeScript, Express, Node, Postgres, Styled components, Chakra UI, Hotjar, Facebook Pixel, Amplitude.
